title: Wheelora
description: A modern car rental platform with seamless booking, filtering, and responsive design. Built with React and optimized for performance.

title: ZenTask
description: A full-stack task management application built with the MERN stack. Features include JWT authentication, secure CRUD operations, and a modern, responsive UI for efficient task organization.

title: Weather App
description: Get real-time weather updates for any city using the OpenWeatherMap API. Built with React, Axios, and beautiful UI elements.

title: ReactForm
description: Reusable form component with validation and custom hook integration. Great example of component architecture in React.

title: Welcomi
description: A warm animated welcome page using React and styled-components. Elegant transitions and interactions.

title: TickTally-React
description: Task tracking app with ticking timers, alerts and task progress visualized neatly. Built with functional components.

title: Thought-Ripple
description: A digital notebook for journaling your thoughts with ripple-inspired UI effects. Perfect for mindfulness.

title: Password Generator
description: Secure password generator with customizable character types and lengths. Focused on UI and security.

title: SyncChrono
description: A minimal, dark-themed clock, stopwatch, and timer app with a sleek UI for time management.
